title: Is there any voluntary prayer between athaan & Iqamah? What about Friday Prayer? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: [Music] is prayer between adam and ekwama if yes what about friday the the time between the first and until the imam comes is it is the time uh for dua or for one prayer i will answer inshallah for him from the emirates he says is there a salat between every adhan and akama answers yes what about friday's friday prayer the answer is no friday prayer when the adhan is given this is when the imam will be delivering the khutbah and it's not permissible for you to stand up and pray you have to sit and listen until the akama is done so this is an exception you
